sentences.english: They will become the "torch carriers" for China-ASEAN friendship.

sentences.english: They are beacons of our students and I hope our students can truely cherish this chance.
sentences.chinese: 希望大家珍惜並好好學習，薪火相傳是可以期待的。

sentences.english: Honesty is the Chinese traditional virtue, let us honest feelings.
sentences.chinese: 誠實守信是中華傳統美德，讓我們將誠信薪火相傳。

definition: to develop/to make full use of
